UdpConnection - Class in de.ovgu.softwareprojektapp.networking
The UdpConnection class is an UDP implementation of the DataSink interface; it sends all input data to the host and port given in the constructor

UdpConnection.SensorOut - Class in de.ovgu.softwareprojektapp.networking
Class to encapsulate sending SensorData objects asynchronously

UpdateButtonsMap - Class in de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.control.commands
This command is used for setting the buttons displayed in the app via a mapping of psychic button ids and button texts.

UpdateButtonsXML - Class in de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.control.commands
This command is used to set the buttons displayed in the app using a subset of allowed android layout resource files.
